main.description: The path the the main javascript/typescript entrypoint of the application

packageJson.description: The path to the packageJson for the project (used for versioning)

appName.description: The name to use when the app is on the home screen

ios.description: An iOS specific name to use

android.description: An Android specific name to use

bundleIdentifier.description: The globally unique identifier of the bundle (changing this will require new app store/play store applications)

bundleVersion.description: An exact bundleVersion to use (Deprecated) (iOS Specific)

versionCode.description: An exact bundleVersion to use (Deprecated) (Android Specific)

development.description: Whether to include development only features

defaultEnvironment.description: The default environment to select in the environment picker

activityAttributes.description: Attributes to include on the Main Activity (Android Specific)

applicationAttributes.description: Attributes to include on the Main Application (Android Specific)

permissions.description: A list of permissions to enable

android.description: A list of which permissions may be required when using the app

ios.description: A record of which permissions may be requested for and the verbiage to use when asking for permission

exceptionDomains.description: Domains which do not use https traffic which are whitelisted

urlSchemes.description: The prefix (ie `myapp` in `myapp://`) to use for deep linking

launchScreen.description: The directory of a template to use for launch screen customization

ios.description: A directory which includes a `LaunchScreen.storyboard` for customizing the launch experience

googleMapsApiKey.description: The API Key for allow access to Google Maps

appIcon.description: A directory which includes the assets for the App Icon

android.description: A directory containing `midmap-${dpi}` directories which contain `ic_launcher.png` icons

ios.description: A directory containing app icons of various sizes

exportMethod.description: The type of export to use when building with Fastlane

exportTeamId.description: The team id to use when building with Fastlane

distCert.description: The distribution certificate name to use for signing the application

distP12.description: The p12 keystore file containing the certificates

entitlementsFile.description: The entitlements file to use for the build

provisioningProfileName.description: The name of the provisioning profile to use for the build

gradleVersion.description: An alternative gradle version to use

storeFile.description: A path to a store file used for signing

keyAlias.description: The alias of a key in that store to use for signing

androidPasswords.description: Passwords for android builds (WARNING: Try to pass this in via a flag rather than saving to a project.json)

storePassword.description: The password for accessing the store file (WARNING: Try to pass this in via a flag rather than saving to a project.json)

keyPassword.description: The password for accessing the specified key in store file (WARNING: Try to pass this in via a flag rather than saving to a project.json)

organization.description: The name of the App Center organization to upload the build to

ios.description: The name to use for uploading iOS Apps

android.description: The name to use for uploading Android Apps

skipPodInstall.description: Whether to skip the pod install on init
